attributes.action: Let noone forget his vision and the innumerable steps already taken to achieve them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no doubt that the current attack on Gordon Brown is a reflection on the dissenters rather than on the man himself.Remember these MPs are adults,responsible for their own actions, and their attempt to deflect attention onto their leader is dispicable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
